originalTitle: 'Half of my friends were killed' - the girls returning to a school caught up in war
title: 'Half of my friends were killed' - the girls returning to a school caught up in war
content: Twins whose classmates were killed by shelling say their deaths have made them determined to finish their studies.

title: US federal agents shoot and kill another person in Minneapolis

title: Two days of peace talks end as Russia continues Ukraine attacks

originalTitle: Adli's injury-time winner ends Liverpool unbeaten run in thrilling game
title: Adli's injury-time winner ends Liverpool unbeaten run in thrilling game
content: Amine Adli scores a stoppage-time winner as Bournemouth end Liverpool's 13-game unbeaten run in a thrilling match at Vitality Stadium.

originalTitle: Bowen leads West Ham to important win over Sunderland
title: Bowen leads West Ham to important win over Sunderland
content: A fantastic first-half performance helps West Ham blow away Sunderland and move to within two points of 17th-placed Nottingham Forest and safety.

originalTitle: Late Romero header rescues draw for Tottenham at Burnley
title: Late Romero header rescues draw for Tottenham at Burnley
content: Cristian Romero rescues a point for Tottenham Hotspur late on just as under-pressure head coach Thomas Frank faced further embarrassment against struggling Burnley at Turf Moor.
